name: madCMS.au
short_description:
madCMS.au is a simple website content management system for people who just want to publish content to their website quickly and easily.

madCMS.au is intended to fill the gap between the large open-source CMS such as Druple, Joomla or Mambo and the basic blog-style of CMS such as WordPress.

madCMS.au is suitable for people who have outgrown a basic flat HTML website or article-style blog, but don't want to wrestle with the complexity of a large CMS just to update content.

+ Ideal for small (5-100 pages) websites

+ Simple light-weight browser-based administration (update from your phone)

+ WYSIWYG editing of content pages

+ Drop-down menus dynamically created from content pages

+ Automatic upload, re-size and embedding of images (QuickImages)

+ Includes simple "Events", "News" and "Shop" modules

+ "Look and Feel" controlled entirely by CSS
